name: CorROOTion by Funguys (read: Fungi)
description:
A Metroidvania game featuring a corrupted politician TUNEP (turnip) who thinks he not. Cronyism, bribery, embezzlement, kickbacks in a form of root vegetables, (which are good politicians) fight back to avoid the entire ROOT vegetable kingdom turning into SOUP!

We are a family of gamers & content developers. Mikael 14 yo & Maisarah 13 yo who are programmers & 2D artist/animators respectively

Press "C" to attack!
